scripts.preinstall: sudo npm run apt --unsafe-perm && sudo npm run crelay --unsafe-perm
scripts.apt: sudo apt-get install libudev-dev libusb-1.0-0-dev libftdi1 libftdi-dev libhidapi-libusb0 libhidapi-dev libusb-1.0-0 libusb-1.0-0-dev -y
scripts.hidapi: cd hidapi && ./bootstrap && ./configure && make && sudo make install
scripts.crelay: cd ./crelay/src; make DRV_SAINSMART=4 && sudo make install && npm run copy-conf
scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified" && exit 1 && rmmod ftdi_sio usbserial
